mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM q where questionType = #{questionType}
mapper.insert: insert into q (userID, questionTitle, questionBody) value (#{userID}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionBody})
mapper.select: select questionNo , userID , questionTitle , questionBody , questionOkDate , questionDate , questionHit , questionType , (select managerID from a where questionNo = q.questionNo) as managerID , (select answerTitle from a where questionNo = q.questionNo) as answerTitle , (select answerBody from a where questionNo = q.questionNo) as answerBody , (select answerDate from a where questionNo = q.questionNo) as answerDate from q where questionNo = #{questionNo}
